greeting: For one and only Ritajya Sharma!!😋
name: Well, It's a special day, a day as special as you are🫣🌷✨
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
text1: I'm actually glad you were born, or else I won't have such a super cool and handsome Boyfie🫣🎀
textInChatBox: Apko pata hai,Ese birthday wish karna na bohot casual aur formal sa lag raha tha, so here we go😋
text2: But, let me tell you it might be a little mess, but I hope you like it😭
text3: And mujhe coding ka C bhi nai aata toh it's entirely based on trials and error, when I'm trying this, I have this urge to ask you for help but firse mai surprise spoil kar dungi like I did for boyfriend's day😭..iss baar control karna hai whatsoever..😤
text4: It's your day and maine firse apni baatein start kardi😭..But let's jump back to the topic okay?😤😋🫣
text4Adjective: Someday, I genuinely want to thank mumma for bringing you to this world, she gave birth to a sweetheart, a Man with soft heart and a strong personality.🔥One who is hardworking and want to do things for his loved once..I admire you a lot, you are just that wonderful!🥹🫶✨
text5Entry: Once again, a very happy birthday honey!!❤️
You are special and you mean a lot to me: And just keep Winning in life, and don't ever give up, you'll fulfill everything you ever dreamt of, and if you ever fail just look back and you'll always find me supporting you😋
bigTextPart1: Just keep growing and excelling in life, with or without me, doesn't matter..But since I'm never leaving so you gonna win in life with me by your side😋✨
bigTextPart2: I'll entertain you throughout our journey 🫣🫶..and I can't let you go,, you know too much about me now.. especially how crazy I can be sometimes😔☝️..Haww that do be risky nah nahh..We ain't going anywhere..we are locked in together BBG😼🎀
wishHeading: Enough apko pareshan karna for the day, Happy Birthday Rinshu!! Happy 18th!😄❤️✨
outroText: Omlll..You turned 18th..aab mai apko kaise tease karungi😭..ye galat hai..but koi naii huhh😭..You still gonna be my bby anyways🫣🌷✨
